org.openhab.binding.lcn.internal

Class LCNActivator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.binding.lcn.internal.LCNActivator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator

    public class LCNActivator
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator
    Extension of the default OSGi bundle activator for the LCN binding. Used to activate the LCN binding.
    Since:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Patrik Pastuschek
